description:
Arc and Ariane head to the Holy Revlon Empire to hunt elf slave traders, but without a clear way forward their path could be perilous. Luckily, a stranger approaches them with a job offer that could make the way forward clearer.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Hoffnung für morgen, in der Wüste gefunden
Hope for the Future Found in the Desert
Sabaku de Mitsukeshi Asu e no Kibou
Une lueur d’espoir trouvée dans le désert
Надежда на будущее, обретённая в пустыне
砂漠で見つけし明日への希望
